free_text.Learning outcomes: To understand the threats which computer networks are exposed to and to know how to protect a network using appropriate technical and organisational measures.
free_text.Content: [b]Threats :[/b][br/]- Spam, phishing, virus, Trojans, denial of service, exploitation of vulnerabilities[br/][br/][b]Protection :[/b][br/]- Firewalls, proxys, virus protection, intrusion detection[br/][br/][b]Protocols and applications :[/b][br/]- Secure e-mail (PGP, S/MIME)[br/]- PPTP, L2TP, IPSec, HTTPS, SSL/TLS, SSH[br/][br/][b]Organizational aspects :[/b][br/]- Risk analysis and security policies[br/]- Norms and standards[br/][br/][b]Regulatory aspects : [/b][br/]- Laws governing information systems
free_text.Type of teaching: Ex cathedra and exercises in room
